bio: Co-founder of Coursera and Landing AI. Adjunct Professor at Stanford.
Co-director of the Stanford Human-Centered AI Institute.
Director of Machine Learning at Apple.
Chief AI Scientist at Facebook AI Research.
Emeritus Professor at University of Toronto.
Co-founder and CEO of DeepMind.
Co-founder and CEO of Anthropic.
Co-founder and Chief Scientist at OpenAI.
Former Director of AI at Tesla.
Co-founder and CEO of Affectiva.
Researcher at Facebook AI Research.
Research Scientist at OpenAI.
Creator of Keras, Google AI researcher.
Professor at UC Berkeley.
Assistant Professor at Stanford University.
Professor at Carnegie Mellon University.
Director of Machine Learning at NVIDIA.
Associate Professor at McGill University.
Former Head of Google Research Europe.
Senior Fellow at Google AI.
